properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued January 18 at 3:01AM EST until January 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...St. Clair and Macomb Counties.

* WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property
including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will
be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong south-southwest of about 30 mph
during the day will lead to elevated water levels particularly
around Harsen's Island and Anchor Bay. Winds will then shift to
westerly Saturday night allowing the lakeshore flooding threat
to subside.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
